cookies_page.title: Cookie Policy — AKIOS

cookies_page.heading: Cookie Policy – akios.ai
cookies_page.category_1: Strictly necessary (session, load balancing, security). Always active.
cookies_page.category_2: Analytics (privacy-friendly measurement). Set only with consent.
cookies_page.category_3: Marketing/Advertising: Not used. If added, explicit opt-in required.
cookies_page.consent_2: No non-essential cookies before explicit consent.
cookies_page.consent_3: Consent proof kept; footer link to modify/withdraw.
cookies_page.retention_2: Analytics: depends on provider; short durations preferred.
cookies_page.control_content: Use banner settings or clear browser cookies. If “Do Not Track” is on, analytics disabled by default.
